person.handwriting: "The body of the letter is penned with medium-sized characters that are usually formed individually. Even though this hand looks proficient, it does not display the degree of penmanship that some other letters dictated by Eudaimonis show." (Bagnall-Cribiore 2006, 144.)
"(...) Eudaimonis wrote the date and salutations in her own smaller hand." (Bagnall-Cribiore 2006, 144)
person.name: Eudaimonis
